summary: The Borrowers are four-inch high "little people" who live under the floorboards.
cast: Christopher Eccleston|Sharon Horgan|Aisling Loftus|Robert Sheehan|Victoria Wood|Stephen Fry|Shaun Dooley|Charlie Hiscock|Anne Hirsch|Warona Seane|Jane Hill|Jonathan Blake|Catherine Burns|Francis Chouler|Jarrid Geduld|Angela P. Martinez
title: The Borrowers (Los inquilinos)
